'''0.2.0_01''' is a server version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on September 10, 2010, which fixes a tool bug.<ref name="blogpost">[[wordofnotch:1098386115|"Minecraft Alpha Server 0.2.0_01, fixing the tool bug"]] – [[The Word of Notch]], September 10, 2010</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a tool use bug in multiplayer.
